text: So, the news is that Kareena Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra are coming together on Koffee With Karan. For the unversed, Kareena Kapoor was Shahid Kapoor before he was dating Priyanka Chopra. And that apparently ignited a cold war between the two leading actresses of B-Town.
title: Priyanka Chopra-Kareena Kapoor To Appear On Koffee With Karan & Here’s Why We’re Expecting Fireworks
description: So, the news is that Kareena Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra are coming together on Koffee With Karan. For the unversed, Kareena Kapoor was Shahid Kapoor before he was dating Priyanka Chopra. And that apparently ignited a cold war between the two leading actresses of B-Town.
